title: PBE account disabled
body: Made my PBE account during the 2013 era of LoL, and I just now tried to log in after years of inactivity on it and it was disabled. I was wondering if there is any possibility that it can be re-enabled so I can play on it? Thank you <3 {{summoner:21}}

replies.body: Hmmmmm I not 100% sure if we'll be able to get that account active again or not, mostly depending on why the account was disabled, to begin with. With that being said, go ahead and hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to get that verification process started.
